content: Consistent with our strong top line performance, we generated $244 million in adjusted EBITDA in the third quarter, up 9.8% year-over-year. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. I think part of our approach to all of this is - and this is why - is to build momentum to drive the business that's in front of us, to grow organically, to have the right people doing the right work at the center of these missions, which tends to be more resilient to overall sort of external uncertainty.
